name: @ukijs/uki-gsheet-db
description: An uki.js-based wrapper around google's API, for using Google Sheets as a database

scripts.build: rollup -c && ls -d examples/*/ | xargs -n 1 cp -v dist/uki-gsheet-db.esm.js && ls -d examples/*/ | xargs -n 1 cp -v node_modules/uki/dist/uki.esm.js

author: Alex Bigelow
